Package Lab04B

Class Instructor

java.lang.Object
Lab04B.Instructor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Faculty, Grad, Lecturer
public abstract class Instructor extends Object
Abstract class - used as blueprint for Grad, Lecturer and Faculty

    • addToEccentricities

      public void addToEccentricities(int eccentricities)
      eccen Setter; function adds or subtracts certain amount from eccen class var; accepts pos or neg change, always keeps class var positive
      Parameters:
      eccentricities - supplies eccen to add or remove

    • getMail

      public void getMail(int newMail)
      function supplies object with certain amount of mail to add to unreadMail class var; 20% chance to add or substract 2 eccen from class var; checks to see if stress is higher than respect, calls cope() if so
      Parameters:
      newMail - supplies function with mail to add
